root: ^At the return of light and sight, Dr. Hyde took in the surroundings. The researcher found himself amid a twisted remnants of humanity.
^This metropolis, much like the one from before yet so different, was abandoned.
^The buildings, or what were left of them.
^In the middle of the destruction—it was more like a nightmare from a supposed-to-be-magnum-opus Dr. Hyde had created—a whimper was caught by Dr. Hyde's ears.
^The kind of sound that wrenched your heart and tugged at the leftovers humanity.
^The unpleasant sound was followed with pained groans and Dr. Hyde couldn't take it any longer.
^Sat in a narrow alley, half hidden thanks to the silhouette, was a person leaning on to the wall.
^With eyes pleading for salvation amid decay.
